001package com.github.aecsocket.demeter.core.config;
002
003import java.lang.reflect.Type;
004
005import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.serializers.Serializers;
006import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.vector.cartesian.Vector3;
007
008import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
009import org.spongepowered.configurate.ConfigurationNode;
010import org.spongepowered.configurate.serialize.SerializationException;
011import org.spongepowered.configurate.serialize.TypeSerializer;
012
013public final class ColorModifier {
014    private final Vector3 value;
015    private final boolean hsv;
016    private final double alpha;
017
018    private ColorModifier(Vector3 value, boolean hsv, double alpha) {
019        this.value = value;
020        this.hsv = hsv;
021        this.alpha = alpha;
022    }
023
024    public static ColorModifier hsv(Vector3 value) { return new ColorModifier(value, true, 0); }
025    public static ColorModifier rgba(Vector3 value, double alpha) { return new ColorModifier(value, false, alpha); }
026
027    public Vector3 value() { return value; }
028    public boolean hsv() { return hsv; }
029    public double alpha() { return alpha; }
030
031    public Vector3 combineOn(Vector3 baseRgb) {
032        if (hsv)
033            return baseRgb.rgbToHsv().add(value).hsvToRgb();
034        else
035            return baseRgb.lerp(value, alpha);
036    }
037
038    public static final class Serializer implements TypeSerializer<ColorModifier> {
039        public static final String HSV = "hsv";
040        public static final String RGBA = "rgba";
041
042        @Override
043        public void serialize(Type type, @Nullable ColorModifier obj, ConfigurationNode node) throws SerializationException {
044            if (obj == null) node.set(null);
045            else {
046                if (obj.hsv) {
047                    node.appendListNode().set(HSV);
048                    node.appendListNode().set(obj.value);
049                } else {
050                    node.appendListNode().set(RGBA);
051                    node.appendListNode().set(obj.value);
052                    node.appendListNode().set(obj.alpha);
053                }
054            }
055        }
056
057        @Override
058        public ColorModifier deserialize(Type type, ConfigurationNode node) throws SerializationException {
059            var nodes = node.childrenList();
060            if (nodes.size() < 1)
061                throw new SerializationException(node, type, "Must be a list starting with first element of either `" + HSV + "` or `" + RGBA + "`");
062            String op = Serializers.require(nodes.get(0), String.class);
063            switch (op) {
064                case HSV -> {
065                    if (nodes.size() < 2)
066                        throw new SerializationException(node, type, "Must be list of [ 'hsv', HSV color modifier ]");
067                    return ColorModifier.hsv(Serializers.require(nodes.get(1), Vector3.class));
068                }
069                case RGBA -> {
070                    if (nodes.size() < 3)
071                        throw new SerializationException(node, type, "Must be list of [ 'rgba', RGB value, alpha value ]");
072                    return ColorModifier.rgba(
073                            Serializers.require(nodes.get(1), Vector3.class),
074                            nodes.get(2).getDouble()
075                    );
076                }
077            }
078            throw new SerializationException(node, type, "Unknown color modifier type `" + op + "`");
079        }
080    }
081}
